verse: Then the heavenly messenger showed me a fourth vision: Joshua, the high priest, was standing in front of the Eternal’s Special Messenger who was presiding over a heavenly council meeting. Standing to Joshua’s right was the one called the Accuser. He was ready to argue that Joshua was unworthy to serve as high priest.
Joshua stood motionless before the Eternal’s messenger, still dressed in filth-covered clothes, as if recently returned from captivity.
The Eternal’s Special Messenger then stood before Joshua and cautioned him.
